They show that they care. For longer stays the facilities to wash and dry clothes are limited, just one washing and one dryer machine. The hotel is relatively close to Disney, shopping centers and restaurants and if you don't mind driving you can stay there to explore LA metro area attractions without being in a congested area.
Manager Response: Thank you! See you next time!

Summary: Perfect last minute simple made planning easy. Very convenient location. Breakfast was awesome . Very nice and very affordable. Parking wasn’t bad either. It was definitely worth every penny. Best value

What a wonderful last night at this Hell Hole. Firstly for $10-15 more you can stay at a REAL hotel nearby. At least 5  within walking distance.  Supposedly they did a renovation of the rooms, well they forgot to put walls between the rooms. This 3 story hotel is a voyeurs dream. It was like living in a brothel.  The walls are basically a piece of drywall, every word on the TV every flush of the toilet every minute the shower is running next door, the overly loud exhaust fan, and yes every grunt, moan, and scream of your neighbors having sex is like its inside your own room.  What building inspector would ever approve this house of cards, 3 story, second little pig house of sticks should be ashamed of themselves.  If that's what your into, great.  Otherwise.  STAY AWAY
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear of the many negative aspects of your stay that you experienced. This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have. Your comments have been shared with our management team for review and improvement.

Summary: We use to live in Orange County and had to come back home for a wedding. We opted to grab a hotel during our trip this time to avoid famliy bs, and we are really happy we did! Why haven't we done this sooner?! Great location in easy access to freeways to head anywhere you need to go. I will most likely stay here for my next business trip as well. Recommend for a great business or quick family stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Horrible customer service towards long-term guests. I’ve stayed their almost every week for the past 2 years. They claim to be a pet friendly hotel, but I’m apparently banned from this location because of my dogs. I live in Vegas, but visit the area often. So today I made my reservation as normal, and when I arrived after my 4 hour long drive, Dominic was the one to tell me I can no longer stay at that hotel. People complained that my dogs used the bathroom outside on the pavement, which I clean up EVERY single time. He tried to give me a vague answer at first and just said it had something to do with my dogs. I see other dogs off leashes, and plenty of dog messes outside that don’t get cleaned up. It’s funny they listen to people staying one night over someone who’s been
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear of the many negative aspects of your stay that you experienced. This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have. Your comments have been shared with our management team for review and improvement.

Summary: 5 Minutes to the Airport! I couldn't believe it. I timed it on a Saturday morning and actually got to John Wayne Airport in 5 minutes. Rooms are decent, but on staying multiple nights, housekeeping was kind of slack. They didn't replace all the used towels, soap, shampoo, and TP.Breakfast was standard for LQ. They close the pantry promptly on-time, without warning, so make sure you don't leave waffles on the griddle at the last minute!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  It will be shared with the team.

Summary: My family stayed for 4 nights, and really enjoyed the new room design.  The pullout couch made accommodating my family a lot easier and enjoyable while we were in our room.  The refrigerator and microwave is a bonus for families with picky eaters.  We appreciated the complimentary breakfast, but some different options over the four days would be appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: I stayed here for one night before I continued my travel in Californian. The hotel is located in good area, the stuff was very polite and professional, and the room spacey and clean, I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your comments regarding your stay. We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed! We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 days during the renovation.  The staff and construction crew were very friendly.  One day, our room had not been cleaned.  By the time we found out at 11pm after returning from being out all day, we were not happy but made it work.  We had hung up our towel before we left and not a big deal the beds were not made.  Breakfast was nice with a good variety, lots of seats and I enjoyed sitting in the lobby area for my breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you, for your review of La Quinta Orange County Airport, we appreciate your feedback as it will help us improve our operation for all future guests.  Please accept our apology; this is definitely not the experience we want you to have when staying with us!

Summary: Everything was fantastic except for the internet service. I found the internet service to be slow as well as problems of getting kicked off the network constantly. Trying to even just play a low resolution YouTube video would cause buffering issues.
Manager Response: I appreciate the feedback on our Wi-Fi. We are pleased to provide complimentary internet access to all guests and are always working with our network administrator to make our network as fast and user-friendly as possible.

Summary: We loved this hotel! Very clean and quiet and our room was big. The breakfast could have been a little better (eggs, waffle maker, sausage, cereal, fruit, yogurt, bagels) but we made the best of it. Would return if I stayed in california again .
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned. Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us. Sincerely, La Quinta Orange County Airport

Summary: This has become our go to when we visit California, and have stayed here 6-7 times with the past 6 months. The staff is always wonderful and our rooms are always nice, big, and clean. The location is awesome - with a lot of great shopping and food options down the street in a beautiful new shopping center.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your rating. We appreciate you staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites and hope to see you again!

Summary: Just dropped off towels.  No housekeeping done.  Good location. Good price. Have stayed here lots of times.  This trip they failed me. Safe hotel. Kids like the pool and the breakfast. We have never had a problem in the past
Manager Response: My deepest apologies. we pride ourselves on cleanliness and attention to detail. I have shared your comments with our housekeeping staff for immediate attention. Kindly contact me on your next visit, and I will personally ensure that your room is immaculate

Summary: The rooms are nice and the price is great The location of the hotel is also nice. Will definitely stay here again and bring my family again. The kids loved the room and were very comfortable in it. Stay here!!

We have stayed at this location and the Thousand Oaks location numerous times in the past and La Quinta Santa Ana is usually my go to place when visiting family in Orange County. However, we stayed the weekend from Friday up until Christmas Eve and this has been our worst stay to date even compared to when they were remodeling. Our room was dirty bedsheets full of pet hair and dirty towels in the bathroom. When I was brought clean sheets I had to change the bed myself. We were placed on the side with rooms that had pets even though we did not have pets and were kept awake by barking all dogs all night and both of my kids had allergies all night from the pet hair and dander in the room. Even through all this I thought maybe its just a fluke and thought to extend our stay for 2
Manager Response: My deepest apologies. we pride ourselves on cleanliness and attention to detail. I have shared your comments with our housekeeping staff for immediate attention. Kindly contact me on your next visit, and I will personally ensure that your room is immaculate

Summary: We stayed there one night and it was very nice - clean and recently updated.  A little of freeway noise in our room, but it didn’t bother us sleeping.  A good sized room.  The free breakfast was ok, but fairly picked over when we got there, but still adequate.  Easy access on and off the freeway.  Pets are free too with plenty of potty stations outside.

One of the nicest LaQuintas I've seen as everything is freshly redone.  Located with a bunch of other hotels -- close to SNA.  Mattress/pillows not the most comfortable. Still pet-friendly with no fees -- thanks!

I will never stay in this hotel, we did not like the service, our room did not get cleaned one day and the day before the cleaning was not complete, i do not believe it was the employee's fault but management

We arrived at the hotel and were amazed to see that the whole hotel had been remodeled. The lobby is bright and welcoming, the breakfast area nicely set up, the rooms are well thought out with so many connection options (electric and USB), the internet was fast and our room had two TVs!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for sleep and fly
Summary: We have stayed many times at this hotel and have always had a good experience.  The shuttle to the airport only takes about 5 minutes or so, which is great for early flights.  The only item i would like to see change is they have no gluten free options for breakfast.   In this day and age, every hotel with a breakfast SHOULD offer some gluten free options.

Summary Heading: It was like a new hotel
Summary: The re-model of the La Quinta, Santa Ana has produced amazing results.  I have stayed at the hotel on several occasions and always found the staff helpful.  I had heard this site was being re-modeled but had no idea it would look this nice.  If you haven't stayed here in a while you should give it a try.

Stayed here during reno & after were both excellent visits. I love this hotel & found my new beach to visit 17 minutes away - Newport. So much fun. I don't sleep at home, but finally had a complete night of uninterrupted comfortable sleep. Thank you so very much.

If you're expecting warm smiles and friendly service, this is not the place for it. The Front Desk personnel are incompetent and have no clue about what "hospitality means'.  I've had problems at several La Quintas now that I will no longer be coming back to any of their locations.

The hotel has been nicely updated and is in a great location.  Tremendous value for Orange County.  I would likely stay there again.  I've stayed there several times before and now with the new check in area and upgrades it is a welcome place to stay.

Nice area, upgraded rooms which were nice. My real problem was there was a bad smell in the room the whole two nights. The water pressure was not high enough for my wife to wash her hair. To rectify this, we found a spa nearby and spent a few hours there on the last night.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned.  Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,  Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Be aware that although remodeled with very nice rooms for the price, it is an older facility with limited ability to control noise in common areas.  Due to poor insulation, it can disrupt your night's sleep.

My husband and I had the best hotel experience at the La Quinta Inn and Suites in Santa Ana!  From the front desk lady who told us about a discount at a local restaurant to scheduling an airport shuttle to the delicious breakfast and finally every part of the gorgeous facility.  We had a wonderful experience and would definitely stay at this La Quinta again if we are in the area!

We often stay at La Quinta's so when needing a place near the Orange County Airport before a morning flight, we booked this La Quinta at $105 for a suite with a sofa pull out. It was easily accessible from the highway on Hotel Terrace along with other hotels which made for a quiet safe neighborhood. It was also a quick jaunt to the airport in the morning. Parking was free. Patty the front desk staffer was friendly and efficient making the check in easy. The grounds are fairly clean (in fact they were upgrading the property as we were there). Rooms have outside exposures so street and balcony noise was apparent. The suites with sofa pull outs were spacious and had microwaves and mini-fridges. King bed was very comfortable. Internet was free and reliable. Breakfast was
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!   Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Nice hotel, nice improvements in past year. Clean, comfortable and pretty.  Staff pleasant.  Excellent location near highways and short distance to airport.  Hotel shuttle was great and prompt. Only one sit-down restaurant in quite reasonable walking distance with good food. Clean, pleasant area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!   Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Clean rooms, nice pool and jacuzzi.  Free breakfast was adequate.  There is no light in the closet, so it was hard to see what clothes to choose out of the suitcase. Didn't use the wifi much, but it seemed ok. Parking was plentiful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: this property has made a major investment in their facility and now it is in excellent shape in all areas. they even brought back their excellent breakfast!  I would highly recommend the location for your next stay in the area.
Manager Response: Joe,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Far better than a normal La Quinta
Summary: This is far more like a Holiday Inn than a La Quinta. Recently redone property, and if La Quinta does them all like this, they’ll become more popular with business travel. They kinda need some cut-up fruit at breakfast and some better quality hot breakfast food, but overall it’s a ate in the right direction.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great location and recently renovated, staff can be improved.
Summary: This was our fifth LQ location along our road trip. Staff here did not seem as welcoming as other locations and even after noting one of the key card given wasn’t working. The front desk person (young male) insinuated that it was demagnetized by me. Although I had the card less than 5 minutes? I would have appreciated an apologetic response and easily to recode the key. Other than this, LQ we liked this location over others, we feel this was an overall 4 rating experience.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I was surprised to pull up at a "motel" and a little bummed out until I went inside the lobby and then our room!  The updated and trendy look is fantastic.  It was super clean, too!  I'd love to give 5 stars but, unfortunately, we didn't get a great night of sleep.  First off, we were super excited about the comfy beds and bedspreads.  They have those wonderful heavy bedspreads that help you sleep like champ.  BUT, you have to be able to cool off your room to do so.  Unfortunately, we checked in late and the HEATER was on in our room.  It was sweltering.  We bumped the thermostat down but never got the room cool enough to sleep well.  Besides that, our door faced the parking lot.  Being a motel, we could hear all the parking lot sounds (constant beeping of people locking their
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Amazing rooms for the price point. Very comfortable.
Summary: Although there was construction going on, it was a comfortable stay. I will be returning soon! Rooms were great. Best option for a la quinta in the area. The other la quinta's in the area need to have this makeover done soon!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This was my first time and staff was great the rooms decor was great. There was construction but it wasn’t to bad as I thought when I first arrived. I will definitely return and will recommend others.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This was my first stay at a La Quinta Inn. I needed a room close to the veterinary office where my Aussie was having surgery. I checked a few of my usual choice hotels, but they were either not pet friendly or the charge for having a pet was exorbitant.  I expected the room to be clean, but it was actually SPOTLESS!  What I did not expect was how clean the grounds were. ALL the grassy areas where I walked my buddy were clean. There was no evidence of this being a pet friendly motel. The staff were positive and friendly, the room had a small fridge, coffee maker & microwave. PERFECT!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed in this hotel during our trip to Anaheim in October 2018. The hotel service and cleanliness met or exceeded our expectation. The room was very clean, the overall hotel setting is very good. I recommend this hotel to anyone who's travelling to Anaheim and Santa Ana LA area.
Manager Response: Mike,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I was traveling with two dogs 35 and 80 lbs.  The staff set us up with a first floor pool facing room that gave me a quieter location and easy access to walk the dogs.  It was there first hotel stay and everything went much  better than expected.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!'  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Nice Room Re-do, but watch out for housekeeping!
Summary: Rooms are nicely redone. Housekeeping doesn't bring missing items to rooms when front desk is called. Was literally hit by housekeeping employee running at full tilt and pushing a housekeeping cart. OUCH! This should not happen, with common sense used...why would someone run at full tilt while pushing a heavy cart, with small children and small dogs and other guests in the vicinity? I was nearly hit three other times by running employees. Ridiculous on a Sunday morning! Sketchy people in back parking lot probably doing drug deals...lock your vehicles!
Manager Response: Kristen,   We appreciate you taking the time to inform us of your recent experience with our staff.  The lack of professionalism described is certainly not in line with our code of conduct.  Your review has been shared with management so that training opportunities are implemented immediately.  Our hope is that you will give us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Place was clean and the staff was nice. Had no problems there. Would stay there again. Only problem was the breakfast. The eggs, bacon and sausages went fast. Get to breakfast early. The hotel is close to UC Irvine.
Manager Response: Darryl,   We truly regret that our breakfast options did not meet your expectations. Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you.  Your review will be shared with our management staff so that we can rectify these issues. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Recently remodeled with great big and clean rooms and facilities with good breakfast
Summary: This place is recently remodeled with great big and clean rooms and facilities with good breakfast. the lobby and courtyard are also very nice with sitting options in courtyard with nice chairs and tables. Very close to Johne Wayne airport and UCI. We will be staying here for all our visits to orange county.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Was greeted with positive vibes upon arrival. Was locked out of our room late at night due to unforeseen malfunction. Staff had issue resolved with a quickness. Upon departure front desk (Patty) was just as positive and overall our stay was great. Will be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are so pleased to hear that we were able to meet your needs and expectations.  As always, we appreciate you choosing La Quinta and hope to see you again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I love the staff and this location. The remodel is coming along just fine and is almost complete. It looks like a new hotel! I've stayed here many times but the last two I needed to clean the bathroom before I could use it. I hope this is not a trend.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at La Quinta. The rooms were very nice and the bed was super comfortable. I really liked the sofa area with the microwave and fridge. The bathroom was clean with plenty of towels. I also enjoyed the breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Ongoing construction  and lack of customer service.
Summary: My first stay at a La Quinta and I’m less than impressed. Checked in around 1 am so there was no wait and no nonsense. Had a room in about 5 mins which was nice because we were very tired. Unfortunately, we were never warned about the construction that would wake us in the early hours of the morning and which is still taking place as of 9/14/18.  Our room was on the first floor facing the pool just across from the lobby which I did enjoy because I’m not a big fan of hotels that have rooms with outside entry. I usually don’t feel safe but I felt safe here because I could see the lobby from my room. The room itself was nicely appointed with new and modern furnishings although it was a bit dark. I already saw some signs of wear and tear in the bathroom so I’m not sure how long this

One of the best hotels here on hotel terrace, after the redid the entire place it’s definitely one of my favorite hotels. Room is huge and very nice. Would definitely recommend this hotel to people. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This was a last minute business trip. The hotel was very well maintained and the room was excellent. The amenities were very nice. I was very surprised at the quality and condition of the room for the cost.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Very welcoming, felt like home. Very nicely renovated rooms. Breakfast was very tasty. The bathroom could have been just a little cleaner. The sofa area made it feel much larger and accommodating for a family. The parking lot is way too small and tight. The breakfast area was a little crowded. I would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: My wife is very happy with the way she is treated and served there everytime she's stayed there.  The staff there is very friendly and accommodating.  The place is nearing completion of full renovations, and looks really nice.  Breakfast was better before.  They pruned out the Sausage, biscuits, gravy, and English muffins.  But they still offer scrambled eggs, sausage, oatmeal, yogurt, various breakfast cereals with milk, white bread, wheat bread, bagels, muffins, and did I mention self-made waffles with butter and syrup?  Other items include cranberry, apple, orange juice, coffee, tea, and cocoa.  If anyone is arriving really late at night around 2am-ish, they might want to call ahead to verify their arrival time with the front desk personnel.  If the hotel is undergoing any
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Best La Quinta I've ever stayed in. Very clean and staffs are very nice and helpful. For the price we've paid, it was such a good deal. This is actually my third time staying at this hotel. I'm a returning customer. It's location is perfect. Right between everything. Close to Newport Beach and Huntington Beach. Had a great weekend. Thanks La Quinta!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: This hotel was very reasonably priced and a good value
Summary: I typically stay in the Best Western across the street which is very nice but this hotel was more than 50 dollars less so I thought I would try it and I was pretty satisfied.  The room was very adequate and the pool and breakfast were good.  I'm a business traveler and usually take naps in the afternoon since I teach in the evenings and this hotel is very quiet.  I expect I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We take pride in the features you mentioned.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel is newly renovated but still undergoing further renovations, outside looks nothing like the picture on Tripadvisor. Rooms were awesome, thoughtfully designed, very clean and spacious. If all La Quinta's were like this, I would stay at them a lot more often. Main reason we chose to stay here was their very friendly pet policy, pets stay free!   Front desk was very friendly and accommodating, breakfast was more then adequate. Housekeeping staff was very nice too. They also have nice water bottle fillers in the lobby which was a nice amenity. Only issue is that the continued renovation going on, how packed the parking lot gets, and honestly some of the people staying at the hotel kind of weirded me out. They would just stand or sit outside.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Your review was such a delight to read!  Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service in the future!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel has just been renovated so there is a nice and new feeling. Staff is courteous, rooms are clean and breakfast has a nice variety.  I will definitely to back. I really like that this hotel is freeway close.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is probably one of the cleanest La Quinta Inns that I have stayed in...and that's even with part of it being under construction. Plus the value is great for this particular hotel. I would recommend staying here if you are in the Orange County area
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Your review was such a delight to read!  Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service in the future!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is a very nice, affordable hotel in Southern California near the airport.  We were visiting the campus of UC Irvine and this hotel was close by and easy to get to.  The staff was friendly and the room was comfortable.  A great restaurant, Spoons, was walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thanks for brightening our day!  We appreciate the positive feedback and will share your review with our staff.    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Newly & nicely remodeled; comfy, quiet, and clean.  Great service and very spacious new breakfast area. THey're still working around pool area so we weren't comfortable using it.  This is our favorite hotel when getting our daughter back to college or picking her up.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the top notch review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Early check in at 7am Beyond Grateful!
Summary: Humidity to the max & unable to take dog with me to conference Held at Disney hotel.So thankful for allowing early check in beyond words as I was not keen on having to kennel my well behaved 15 lb dog. Front desk staff & breakfast area staff friendly & helpful. Felt like I was staying at a Bed & Breakfast. A hotel guests dog scratched my leg & staff had topical antibiotic ointment available for me along with an antiseptic wipe. Rooms are beautiful recently remodeled. Great location off 55 easy drive to Newport Beach, John Wayne Airport & Dland. Would definetely stay again thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the top notch review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is our second time to stay at this property, since the remodel.  We actually prefer to stay her, even though our last two trips we did not have our dog.  Great location, very clean, quiet, and very comfortable bed.  I highly recommend for the price.  Great job in the remodeling!
Manager Response: Brenda,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Booked his hotel at the last minute to be closer to the airport. Booking was seamless. Hotel was conveniently located. Arrived and got checked in quickly. Was disappointed the hot tub started construction and wasn’t told when I booked it though. Room was very clean, newly renovated. Very comfortable. Felt like a suite with a sitting area and two TVs. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful with questions. Breakfast area was huge with a large selection. It was well stocked by friendly woman. Great place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate your kind words and superb review!  Our guest satisfaction is very important to us.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: basketball team very loud at night and called 3 times to office before they stopped..ok place was on business so never used facilities..ice machine broke for several days and under construction so may have hit it at a bad time..staff friendly
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience with us.  This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have.  Your comments regarding your noted inconveniences have been shared with our management team so that corrective measures are considered and made.  Sincerely,  Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is a great value,  full remodel is ongoing, but lobby and rooms are all newly upgraded, plenty of outlets ( a big deal when traveling with the family), rooms are spacious and beds are queens not doubles.  My only negative is that it is still outside corridors, but not a deal breaker if you can get a good price.  Very easy freeway access and decent parking area.  Breakfast is very good and eating area is really spacious and open.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests. Summary Heading: A lot of construction as of July 2018
Summary: The hotel overall is decent, but right now it is under renovation construction at a large scale. Very noisy. They start early and wont finish until late.  Also my room is close to the pool and can hear kids screaming well into the night.   Breakfast was good.   Hotel is on Orange County airport fly route and can hear airplane noise (real close) every now and then.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay. We hope you’ll stay with us again after our renovation has been completed and tell us what you think about our improvements.    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Beautiful but loud as they are renovating
Summary: I always love la quinta hotels.  I drove in with my daughter and picked up my son at the airport. We went to Disneyland the next day. It was really nice because it was close to both the airport ajd Disneyland. And of course they have a nice breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the top notch review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: This is a clean and comfortable hotel at reasonable prices in this region. Most hotels at this location (Hotel Terrace) look more or less the same. Unfortunately there is not much to do outside the hotel in walk distance.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the constructive feedback and are happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable overall.  We hope to see you again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I am not that kind of people who just sea4ch for something bad. No, i usually fty to find even more better things then i get. So, here was something that means not the best luck ever. The room was good, clean, and bed was awesome!  But, cockroaches - huge one! Under my door, seems came from the street - being hungry and hot. Then reconstruction work of parking area from 9AM, when i get use to miss breakfast to sleep till11 am. Reconstruction inside building - also whole day.  All this noise made me kind of tired.  Thanks God - the bed and 4 pillows were so good as aircon was so cold, and i just hide myself under all these possible stuff. 😁😁😁

Summary: Everyone was friendly.  The room was updated and very roomy.  The king size bed was wonderful to sleep on. The breakfast was good.  I did not really care for the eggs but the other food items made up for that.

Summary: Great location very nice hotel. Staff very friendly. Room was excellent and decor is wonderful.  The location is close to everything. I have stayed a few times here and will not stay anywhere else.  Breakfast was wonderful with lots of options.

There is also questionable activity (drugs/prostitution) happening (as confirmed by Santa Ana Police) at this property. The pool area is messy, old, open to anyone, and in great need of an upgrade.

Summary Heading: Hotel MIGHT be better after renovation is complete
Summary: This hotel is being renovated, which is good, because it needs it.  The noise from the renovation woke us up each day of our stay before 8:00 a.m.  There is also a lot of noise from the pool area.  While our room was recently updated, the door on the bathroom was not a good choice.  It was a sliding barn door, which was lovely, but you can not LOCK the bathroom door.

Summary: Nice and convenient. Clean and comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel to other travelers .the breakfast is simple and does not vary much. I thought the price was fair and the rooms are clean . Bathrooms have been updated and the staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Lots of noise and construction personnel and hardly no ice. Otherwise nice rooms. Seems like you would get a discount for the construction. Breakfast was ok, not warm enough for me. Lack of food to be filled.

We needed a one night stay prior to our departure from John Wayne airport. We chose this hotel based on proximity to airport as well as positive reviews. The ongoing construction was very annoying since you could not get to the lobby from the front and had to get to the lobby from the back of the hotel. Breakfast was so served so late on Sunday we were not able to partake prior to our flight. And even though all the rooms have been completely redone, there was the strangest smell in the bathroom, I still can’t place it. I also am NOT a fan of the sliding barn door for the bathroom. It’s far too heavy and loud to close at night when sharing a room with others.

Summary: Nice and friendly staff....rooms average for this class hotel.....lots of construction going on during our stay.  Upgraded room above average.  But for a few dollars more, try the Hampton Inn across the street, much nicer rooms and breakfast is way better!!

Summary: Front desk staff were very accommodating.  I had requested a quiet room when I reserved the room.  The only quet room was on the 3rd floor and had 2 queen beds instead of one king.  They gave it to me for the same price. The complementary breakfast was excellent.  Got to make waffles which were delicious.  Front desk staff were very hepful in providing directions.

Summary: While the hotel is currently undergoing renovations, we were lucky enough to be in a newly remodeled room.  It was lovely!  Nice couch, two big screen TV's, nice bathroom.  My only complaint would be the choice of a barn door for the bathroom... doesn't allow complete privacy for the person inside.

Summary: We stayed for two nights and enjoyed the cleanness, quality and comfort of the room. The breakfast were good. Staff were polite and helpful. We stayed in many hotels and overall this is a nice hotel with quality.

Summary: My 2 night stay had a lot of positives and a few negatives. First of all, the room was large, modern, and relatively clean. The fridge and microwave were nice to have. They accept pets without an extra fee so that is awesome for myself and my 2 small dogs. There was a dog potty area just outside my room. The immediate area seemed safe and I saw a security guard watching the parking lot and the hotel. Check in was quick and easy and the staff during the daytime was very nice. I didn't try the free breakfast but the coffee was surprisingly tasty for a hotel. The location was great -- Huntington beach was a 20 minute drive.  However, I did find a few things concerning. The construction, as a few reviews mentioned already, was ongoing the first morning I was there. Very loud and
Manager Response: Katie,   We sincerely appreciate the time you’ve taken to provide such constructive feedback regarding your experience.  We are very sorry to hear of the unsatisfactory aspects of your stay.  This information has been forwarded to our Management Team to ensure improvements are considered and made.  We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: We had 2 giant cockroaches in the room.  It had a wet floor.  The room was dirty.  Outside we found more cockroaches crawling around.  Housekeeping cleaned the entryway floor and bathroom with the same dirty towel.  Overall, not worth the stay -- poor facility, poorly trained and updated staff.  Had to also move our car from the handicapped spot so construction could pour concrete - good thing I was out there when the cement truck was getting started.  No staff/construction crew coordination, poor maintenance and cleaning and overall a lousy experience.
Manager Response: Barry,   We want to take this opportunity to apologize for the pest and cleanliness issues that you experienced.  The safety and comfort of our guests is very important to us.  Your concerns have not been taken lightly.  We are working diligently with our staff and pest Management Company to combat any problems.  Again, please accept our sincere apology.  We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed here while visiting Newport Beach. The hotel is undergoing remodeling so it was a little noisy. However, the rooms were very clean and update. The parking was free. The breakfast was good but the serving area is a little cramped. Eat early to avoid the crowds. Otherwise a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests. Summary: This hotel is undergoing renovations, so I suggest a room that doesn't face the noisy Courtyard. Our room had been renovated and was nice and comfortable. Also note that the elevators are located right by the lobby and some rooms are a very long walk from them.  We stayed for six nights, and the housekeeping never replaced our toiletries! We ran out of soap and had to ask for more. Our tissues ran out and no extra boxes were in sight. That is a little cheap, in my opinion. The breakfast was decent but not great. They needed more people working when the hotel was packed. The staff in the breakfast area worked super hard but couldn't keep up with the demand. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful, and all in all we had a pleasant stay and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests. Summary: I loved the roomy King Suite. I enjoyed being able to relax with my family on the comfortable couch. The room was very clean and comfortable. I enjoyed the continental breakfast. The waffles are my favorite.
Manager Response: Julia,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I just stayed at La Quinta Inn & Suites Orange County last weekend.  I have a dog and my dog is welcome at this hotel.  The bed was very comfortable.  The shower was powerful.  The breakfast was perfect.  The remodel was absolutely beautiful.  I had a great experience and would recommend this hotel,
Manager Response: Chuck,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Recently stayed there for 2 nights with family for my daughter’s graduation. La Quinta is not usually on the top of my list for places to stay but on this particular weekend they had the best prices in the area. I was pleasantly surprised as the hotel had undergone a major renovation and the rooms were very nice. Bathroom had all new fixtures. Rooms were clean and beds very comfy. WiFi was excellent. Air conditioning was a bit noisy in one of the rooms and manager Patty showed up within 10 minutes with the maintenance person, determined it could not be repaired immediately and offered us another room. She was personable and professional at the same time and made our stay very enjoyable. La Quinta is very lucky to have her as a manager. Complimentary hot breakfast was good with
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us. Summary Heading: Best option in the area and super clean
Summary: I've stayed here for 4 nights during 2 stays in the last month (most recently 6/13/18). The hotel exceeded my expectations.  The hotel is under renovation which, for me, equals a very clean and new room. The rooms have microwaves and mini fridges as well as comfy mattresses and new pillows.  The lobby and the breakfast area are brand new and the breakfast is great. Free breakfast consisted of scrambled eggs, make-your-own waffles, fruit, biscuits, sausages, cereal, etc. plus coffee and tea. The breakfast attendant was there promptly filling up the food and keeping the tables clean.   Free parking and free fast wifi.   Plus, extra points for one of those filtered-water water bottle fillers in the lobby.  Renovations were still occurring as of my 6/13/18 stay. Depending on where
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Your review was so refreshing to read!  Your wonderful comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service for years to come!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Room was super clean and nicely renovated, it was our favorite hotel out of 6 we stayed at for our move from  HI to CO. The only thing I can complain about are the workers for the construction going on around the building. They were creepy, smoked weed around our room, and were loudly talking to each other once their shifts were finished right outside our hotel room. Otherwise great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: A change in staff would probably help.
Summary: The hotel is under renovation and the desk staff I wouldn’t describe as friendly or available. Inside the room was nice as long as I ignored the barking dog and smoking neighbors outside my window. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for your review.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  The lack of professionalism and concern that you described is certainly not the standard code of conduct.  We will be forwarding your feedback to the hotel management team to be reviewed and addressed.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I stayed three nights. Currently there is much construction noise and mess which I can tolerate BUT I returned to my room today to find my hotel room door open. I am positive I firmly shut it  when I left the room earlier in the day as I knew that the door needs a strong arm to open and and close it.  The door and lock has problems sand apparently the cleni g person was lax and did not shut the door. It was obviously open and one could see that. This is unacceptable. I had belongings in the room. When I called the front desk no one picked up even after thirty rings

Service at the desk was horrible, we came in late as we are moving across country. The hotel is under construction and once I found the front desk he was no help showing me where the only two elevators were for the whole place or where I should park my car to unload.

Excellent value, friendly employees, easy access to hotel, free and plenty parking, quiet at night, internet included, plenty of breakfast options. We arrived half an hour before check in time and our room was ready.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests. Summary: This LaQuinta Inn is currently in the last stages of a gigantic remodel.  The rooms are lovely and the check-in area is also quite nice. The free breakfast has now been upgraded and is much heartier.  When the remodel is complete, this LaQuinta will be a real gem.
Manager Response: Mary,  Thanks for taking the time to provide your feedback on your stay. It would be such a pleasure to welcome you back to our new and improved hotel!    Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Hotel will be great when renovation is done.

Summary: The whole property is going through a renovation so there is some construction. That is the only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5. The location is great. The new rooms are beautiful. New lobby and breakfast area. The staff is very helpful. Especially Christine at the front desk. She will brighten your day.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Your kind comments are very much appreciated. We hope to see you back real soon.                                                                                              Respectfully,                                                                                                                                         Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Economic hotel price for spacious room.
Summary: Economic hotel price and convenient location.  Check-in staff was courteous and provided prompt service.  Spacious and clean room. Breakfast staff was friendly and helpful. Enjoyed the breakfast and variety of hot/cold drinks.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel many, many times.  The staff is always very courteous and the rooms are always very clean.  The hotel is currently undergoing renovations and should be very nice when completed.  The exterior is generally a little dirty, but everything else is generally very clean and nice.
Manager Response: Teri,   We sincerely appreciate the constructive feedback and are happy to hear that your stay was enjoyable overall.  We hope to see you again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: I love staying here. The rooms are always nice and clean. The air conditioner looks great. There remodeling outside but the lobby looks beautiful. The breakfast is amazing. There is something for everyone.
Manager Response: Cecilia,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: Beware lots of renovations. They really need it. Beat up hotel. Noisy . Glad we didn't stay more than a night. Newer lobby is nice after you walk through construction detour. Outside doors. Room was adequate.
Manager Response: Gerrie,  Thank you for sharing your feedback. We regret that our renovations caused an inconvenience during your stay. It is certainly our goal to deliver a comfortable and enjoyable stay for each and every guest and apologize that was not your experience. We do hope you will come back and give us another opportunity to serve you.   Respectfully, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: It is an excellent hotel ! People are very nice. Not really far from SNA. Breakfast is included. There is a swimming pool and shuttle for the airport. No noise during night. I would definitely recommend that hotel !
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for posting a review of our excellent hotel.  We are delighted that you had a good experience at our hotel and look forward to having you as a guest again soon. Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Hotel is under renovation. Construction Workers start at 8am. If you plan to stay in your room during the daytime it can be very noisy. Renovated rooms look fabulous. I especially like that the floors are laminate - no carpet. Breakfast consists of eggs, sausage, waffles, cereal. Bread was a bit stale. Thermostat in room coudn't be set below 65F and temp never dipped below 67F.
Manager Response: Abhishek, Thanks for taking the time to post a review of our hotel and for your kind words about recently renovated rooms.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and are confident that our upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are extremely sorry for any inconveniences due to our renovation efforts and have shared your comments with management to ensure the issues mentioned are addressed.  We look forward to having you as a guest again soon to experience our fully updated property. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: La Quinta is really doing a great job with the remodeling of this hotel. The new rooms are very modern and comfortable. I am really impressed. The lobby is about to open and has fresh clean lines very contemporary. If they finish the whole facility to this standard it will be great. Right now the pool area has not been touched but I see new trees are delivered and ready to install. With its outsde corridors it will always be more motel than hotel, but well done to the architects, designers,suppliers and contractors for the progress so far
Manager Response: Malcolm,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Overnight stay La Quinta, Santa Ana
Summary: The Hotel/Motel can be a nicer experience. The place was being remodeled so it wasn't very pleasant due to the obstacles and mess. The grounds were littered and there was food on the ground for 2 days that no one picked up. The room was very nice and the beds were very comfortable. I loved the water pressure in my shower. It's rare anymore to find a shower with strong water pressure. I really appreciated that. There was a young kid working the check-in desk. He was friendly and handled our check-in efficiently. Girl who called our room at the checkout time was curt.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback on our property. We are always striving to improve our property and genuine feedback is the best way for us to do that. We hope that you will visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel is an older style with a lot of construction going on. The room we stayed in was very clean and everything was new. The only real complaints I have was the construction going on and the walls are paper thin. But overall I would stay here again after the construction is finished. Also breakfast wasn't to bad at all.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for sharing your review and giving us an honest look at the guest experience in our hotel. We are pleased that you had a good stay overall. However, we apologize for the issues with our renovation. Hopefully you'll visit us again when all our new offerings are ready.   It would be such a pleasure to welcome you back to our new and improved hotel!    Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: We were there for the Dog Show, which we have been in for  over 10 years....Have stayed @ La Quinta Inns & Suites in the past..always pleasant & comfortable, but the newly remodel rooms are quite lovely!!  Room size is nice for two people & 2 large dogs.. Look forward to our return next year!!
Manager Response: Maria,   Thank you for taking the time to provide your wonderful feedback, as it is greatly appreciated.   We appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.  Respectfully,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: I Enjoyed the Renocations that this dpel oowhat a great deal i got
Summary: Got a room here using hotwire for less than 100 out the door and man, let me tell you what a GREAT DEAL I got! First of all, let me start with this hotel's 2.5 Star rating that it has: This is the first example I have ever seen before where the "REAL" star rating of a property may actual be at or above what the "PUBLISHED" star rating is (so don't let the 2.5 star rating dissuade you from considering to stay here or not). Second, this hotel boasts comfortable and spacious, ultra modern interiors so they have a cool, swanky feel to them (you’ll know what I mean once you get inside and see the place in person).  Some other featured amenities that my room had that I enjoyed were: •	2 large, flat screen TV’s •	Separated “living” and “sleeping” spaces  •	Modern furniture with a bench
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: During my stay, there was a constant stream of new people knocking on the door to the room next door. Clearly they weren’t staying there if they had to knock. This lasted from 11pm through 4am. I don’t know of any legal stays in a hotel that follow this pattern of behavior. People were in cars in the parking lot at 11pm waiting for something. This made me very nervous to stay here. I’ve been to multiple La Quinta’s and none were like this!
Manager Response: Lisa,   We are very sorry to hear of your negative experience with us.  The safety and comfort of our guests is very important to us.  Your concerns have not been taken lightly.  This review has been forwarded to management for further investigation.  Please reach out to the hotel's General Manager so that we can better address these concerns.  Again, please accept our sincere apology.  We hope you will consider giving us another chance in the future to better your opinion.  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary: We reserved a room within view of our motorcycles, as they are expensive and a vandalism/theft risk (not lockable like a car).  Specifically asked about this when making the reservation, yet when we returned to our room after a baseball game nearby there was literally zero parking anywhere on the hotel grounds.  Somebody else in a car was circling repeatedly, also looking for a spot.  Had to stash our expensive machines in the landscaping and came out to find one on its side with damage (cosmetic paint damage plus brake system disabled).  Overselling parking especially when it was a specific need is really bad.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. The issues you described are truly regrettable. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you and have shared your comments with our management staff to ensure the issues are addressed immediately.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and hope you will stay with us again in the future.    Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Don’t judge a book by its cover. Or a hotel.
Summary: We stayed at this location on our family road trip. When first pulling into the parking lot all the construction and equipment is a little off putting. Renovations are being completed on the lobby area and the rooms are already beautifully renovated. There is lots of signage to help navigate to the lobby and elevator during the remodel. There is some noise from the airport so if your pup is highly responsive to noises this might not be the place for you. Our dog is used to that noise so it didn’t phase him one bit. Easy on and off for travel too.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We got a great room and a good night sleep. The room has tasteful decor. Bathroom is very new and clean. We're very happy with our stay.  Thank you management & staff. Keep up the good work. Highly recommend the property.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This was a great place to stay for the start of our 4 day Disney vacation. It is very close to the airport, yet very quiet. The location is within a hotel/commercial area so it is super safe and yet very close to restaurants, Costco, shopping etc.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites and hope to see you again!              Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This property is going thru a major renovation.  The room we stayed it was very nice, spacious and clean.  From the outside it doesn’t look quite as nice but we were very pleased.  The staff was friendly, the breakfast was as you would expect at this type of hotel.  The only negative was that in that area with about 10 hotels there was only one restaurant about a 5 minute walk (we did not have a car).
Manager Response: Andrea,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent stay at our property. We hope you’ll stay with us again after our renovation has been completed and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Room was great for size.... I did not like the barn door for the Bath Room..it does not really seal and you can see inside the bathroom when occupied..it may be a space saver, but compromised.. Renovation compromised parking significantly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We appreciate you taking the time to post feedback of your recent stay.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that all of our guests will benefit from our many upgrades.  We are delighted that you liked our large, updated and comfortable rooms; however, we are extremely sorry that our construction had a negative impact on your stay and do hope to have you visit us again in the future to experience our fully updated hotel. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: The hotel was under construction when we arrived, the rooms were nice, the wi-fi was terrible, and the food was adequate, although the service time of 7:00 am was not good. Overall, I was not impressed with the hotel.
Manager Response: Tim, Thanks for posting a review of your recent stay.   We are glad that you had a mostly good stay; however, when we fall short of meeting all of our guests needs we re-evaluate how we can improve.   As you mentioned, our hotel in undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are extremely sorry if our construction had a negative impact on your stay and do hope you will be our guest in the future to experience our fully updated property.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: Room OK but Hotel under renovation
Summary: Booked a last minute room in a buy anaheim.  Figured La quinta would be safe.  Sadly this location is under renovation, so there is no exercise room, power tools start before 8 a.m. and the common rooms are either closed or dismal.  Just a warning, be are they are done with construction if you want to sleep in at all!
Manager Response: Mark, Thanks for posting a review of your recent stay.  We are extremely sorry for the disturbance of our renovation.  This is certainly not the kind of guest experience we want you to have.  As you mentioned, our hotel in undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are extremely sorry this had a negative impact on your stay and do hope you will be our guest in the future to experience our fully updated property.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: poor service and limited services because of major construction project: noise, limited parking, very late room make up,  no usable exercise room, breakfast eaten outside on rainy 55F morning. More like punishment than pleasure. Plus my car got dinged by someone in the parking lot probably because the construction made it very tight and crowded.
Manager Response: David, We appreciate you taking the time to post feedback of your recent stay.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that all of our guests will benefit from our many upgrades.  We are extremely sorry that our construction had a negative impact on your stay and caused an inconvenience.  We hope you will visit us again in the future to experience our fully updated hotel. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland, when we first pulled up I wasn’t impressed by the exterior, looks like the place could literally fall apart. I was surprised when we got our room and it was one of the nicest rooms I’ve seen. Only complaint is the bathroom door, you can see into the bathroom even with the door closed. The stAff is extremely friendly and helpful, definitely would stay here again. I’d also like to add that even though they are doing work on the hotel, I heard no noise at all.
Manager Response: Bree,  Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your next stay is just around the corner!  We look forward to being here for you on your next visit.   Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel/lobby was under going renovations so the property was a bit of a mess.  But....I loved the decor and the comfort of my room.  I was traveling with my dogs for a funeral and it was nice that I could leave the dogs in the room.  The only thing that bothered me at this location was my credit card was being denied due to me not telling my CC company that I had planned on traveling to California.  I had to call the CC company 2 days in a row to get it cleared.  The first LQI&S in Pomona let me check into my room while I straightened things out.  This Santa Ana location would not let me check into my room until I got the card working again.  A bit of a hassle with 2 dogs anxiously awaiting to get out of the car.  I was also not told where coffee and breakfast was being
Manager Response: Gretchen, Thanks for posting a review of your recent stay.   As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are delighted that you loved our new décor and look forward to having you visit us again to experience our fully updated property.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Location is easy enough to get to and from the Anaheim Convention Center, the upgraded rooms were great, jack hammering not so great, staff was great, Breakfast is great, 50% increase in rate without knowing was not so great.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your review. We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose us for your future lodging needs.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Newly refurbrished rooms top to bottom
Summary: I always liked this hotel, now with the NEW ROOMS it's perfect.  Still under construction, can't wait to see the new lobby. Staff is always friendly and helpful, especially the nice lady in the breakfast room.
Manager Response: Karen,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Vary the breakfast menu.  Same thing everyday doesn't not serve you well.  Staff was very friendly, polite and accomodating.  Newly remodeled room was excellent.  Location is very convenient to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your positive feedback on our property. We are always striving to improve our property and genuine feedback is the best way for us to do that. We hope that you will visit us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: We reserved this LQ cause we were visiting Newport Beach and Davies Locker. This was the best priced hotel close to this area. The staff was wonderful, and the rooms were clean and comfy. My one issue is the bathroom door on the King Bed room. Big gaps on both sides of the door/maybe get doors that are the correct size. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites and hope to see you again!              Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is undergoing a remodel.  I loved my renovated room.  The bed was comfortable and I really liked the sitting area.  It's great to have a refrigerator & microwave (even though I didn't need them on this trip).   It was a little confusing finding the check in desk, but the clerks were very friendly.  The woman in the breakfast area was very pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for posting a review of your recent stay.   As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that all of our guests will benefit from our many upgrades.  We are delighted that you liked our updated rooms and enjoyed the comfortable bed and room amenities.  We look forward to having you as a guest again to experience our fully updated property.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: The place is excellent, it is a great price and the new decor is awesome. The hotel is very clean and the staff are pleasant. I would stay again and its nice they are pet friendly.  Great location to airport yet not none.
Manager Response: Jennifer, Thank you for choosing La Quinta Inns and Suites, and for your kind words about our pleasant staff and our new décor.  We appreciate you sharing your guest experience with the TripAdvisor community as it helps other travelers decide which hotel is the right one for them.  We are delighted that you found our hotel to be a good value and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: not up to expected locale standards and allow pets for messing room with outside appearance not kept up in addition to other things non-desired in addition to very noisey when room facing the 405 freeway
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback, as it is very important to us.  We are very sorry to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and will share your comments with the management team. We do hope you will once again choose us for your lodging needs.                                                                                                                                                       Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Our room was newly remodeled which was very nice except it had an annoyingly loud bathroom vent fan that you could not turn off except to shut off the bath light. We notified the desk and they said all the fans were getting changed out in a few days. The beds were pillow top and pillows were all very comfortable. Once the remodel is finished I think this will be a good hotel. One thing we found odd is that there were not any near by restaurants and this was in a hub of hotels, you would have to drive to one.
Manager Response: Brenda,   We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience with us.  This is certainly not the experience we hoped you would have.  Your comments regarding your noted inconveniences have been shared with our management team so that corrective measures are considered and made.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great place near Irvine & Disneyland to stay with dog
Summary: I was looking for a hotel near Hotel Irvine where I had a conference, but I wanted to bring our puppy on the trip. Enter this La Quinta. While Hotel Irvine would have charged an extra $50 a night for our 3 pound pup, La Quinta had no extra charges for the dog. The hotel was clean, modern and roomy (King). It doesn’t look like much from the outside, but it’s what is in the rooms that matter and that part was great. We got a room that was just renovated. The prices are very reasonable. Now, there are some drawbacks one being major renovations are still going, which is noisy. This also blocked the way to the elevator so you had to walk around a bit. There was also a lot of pot smell coming from somewhere the first couple of days when you walked past a certain area of the hotel,
Manager Response: Melissa,   We certainly appreciate the time you've taken to provide your feedback.  It sounds as though your experience was enjoyable overall. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.   We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is in a good convenient location. Close to Santa Ana, Newport Beach and Laguna beach. Good value for the area. Our room was recently renovated and clean. However, the hotel common areas were still undergoing renovations as of 2/2018.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the great review.  We look forward to serving you again in the near future!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: CHRISSTY in customer service is awesome..i had some issues with my stay and i dont speak very good english but chrissty
Summary: CHRISTY is the best FOREAL she would help u get anything u want..she is so cool ...so professional..sp patient especially if u dont speak very goood english ..she is the best...CHRISTY for MANGER....PS THE breakfast is the BOMB
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your kind comments and for choosing La Quinta Inns and Suites. We will be sure to let our staff know how much of an impact they made on your experience. We are always pleased to be your second home when you're at the area.   Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: The hotel is under remodel while we were there. They were considerate regarding the noise & mess. Mostly our stay was good. It is easy to to & from the JW airport. My only complaint was the room service appeared cheap. They forgot little things which could be a problem if your stay was longer.
Manager Response: Brian,  While we are happy to hear that overall your visit to La Quinta was positive, it’s a disappointment that even one aspect of your stay failed to exceed your expectations.
