Thank you for your honest feedback, and we hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I had booked this facility at a great rate as an "Express Deal" through Priceline, so wasn't real sure of what I might get, but I could not have been more pleased!   This hotel was located about ten minutes from John Wayne Airport, and right across the street from the Highway 55 freeway to Balboa/Newport Beach!!  The staff at the hotel was extremely friendly and went out of their wait to accommodate any request I might have, including an early check-in and late check-out time.   The hotel was very clean and the room I stayed in had recently underwent a renovation.  The pool looked to be very clean and inviting.  I cannot say enough about the complementary buffet breakfast...must more than a "Grab-N-Go"...the cook "Kathy" was absolutely AWESOME and made sure the trays were full
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta!      Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Will always look to stay at La Quinta, had an amazing experience. Room was immaculate, great customer service and room had a spa like ambiance! Loved it and would highly recommend it to anyone regardless of leisure or business.
Manager Response: Evelyn,  Thank you very much for staying at the La Quinta Inn & Suites. We are happy to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations. We certainly hope to see you again in the very near future.  Sincerely, Diana – LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: La Quinta inn and suites Orange County airport
Summary: Room and bed were excellent. Hotel was under renovation so overall experience was not what it could be. Breakfast was ok. Service was excellent. Staff provided a tooth brush that I needed. Proximity to John Wayne airport was a plus.
Manager Response: Michael,  Thank you for sharing feedback about your recent stay at our property. We hope you’ll stay with us again after our renovation has been completed and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Rooms were updated. Cute and clean. Staff was very friendly. The flowers in the courtyard are beautiful. Breakfast was nice and the salsa was delicious! The hotel will be very nice when construction is complete. Should be done in a couple of weeks.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to provide your wonderful feedback, as it is greatly appreciated.   We appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.  Respectfully,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: The trip served it purpose for 1 night stay.
Summary: The location was perfect for what I needed in the area. The hotel is undergoing renovations, but my room was updated. The cable satellite didn't work, but maintenance came up right away and fixed  the issue (cord). They had hot breakfast (sausage, eggs, waffles, oatmeal, etc). I will say there were a few sketchy characters, so I was nervous. But I felt better being on the 2nd floor. Appears some people live in the hotel (one room had potted plants and pictures in the window sill). There looked like a few guys where conducting illegal transactions in the parking lot. Someone also was knocking on my neighbors room door, while out side talking at 11pm. When the door wasn't opened, they started knocking on my door. I was getting ready to call for hotel security, but it appears the
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for posting a review of your stay.  We are delighted that you liked our location, our complimentary breakfast and your recently updated room.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We do apologize for the negative impact our construction had on your stay.  Many of the issues you mentioned will be resolved once our renovation is complete; however, this is certainly not the kind of experience we want you to have.  We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention and do hope to have you as our guest again in the future for a better experience.  Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: This hotel is definitely worthy of a better star rating than 2.5.  I've stayed there twice recently and even during their "facelift construction", everything was as good or better than expected.  Great hotel at a great price!!  Will definitely return to this hotel property again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay and for your comments about our hotel being a good value.  As you mentioned, we recently completed a renovation and are delighted that you had a great stay.  We look forward to having you stay with us again. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: I was blown away by the room.
Summary: Okay, LaQuinta is middle of the road; good but not great. Color me surprised.  This hotel is undergoing a huge reno, but - wow!!! The new rooms are as good, if not better than higher end hotels.  Really.   Great location and great deal people. The “lobby” is now in a room as the main entry is under huge construction.   I am truly impressed.  Lots of outlets and USB outlets.  Outstanding!!!
Manager Response: ConVivo, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay and for your kind words about our new modern look.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are delighted that you had a pleasant stay and look forward to having you stay with us again to experience our fully upgraded property. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Management was great and accommodating for my family and dog.  I had an updated room that I requested ahead of time.   Free breakfast, free parking no pet fees are always a plus.  Can't wait to see how it will look after remodeling.
Manager Response: Charmaine,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The newly remodeled rooms are very clean, elegant and modern.  The Star was very helpful, answered all my questions and even helped me sign up for the rewards program.  The room was very clean and extremely comfortable.
Manager Response: Israel, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay and for your kind words about our newly remodeled rooms.  We are delighted that you had a good stay and look forward to having you as our guest again in the future. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary Heading: Great location close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: nicely remodeled rooms, shuttle service to and from airport ... 5 minutes away.  Place has nice pool and hot tub, gym  Great way to start your vacation.  We do the Park and Fly and have used this hotel 4 times now.
Manager Response: James,   Your review was such a delight to read!  Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service in the future!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The hotel lobby was under construction during my stay but my stay was incredible nonetheless. The room was newly renovated and beautifully decorated. It was so modern. The bathroom was beautiful as well. The two queen bed room was perfect for a family of 4 and a pet dog.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks so much for taking the time to submit a review of your stay. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your newly renovated room and look forward to seeing you again real soon!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Our stay at this property was EXCELLENT!  Our room was great, the king bed was sooo comfy, the bathroom was modern with a great shower!!, and the breakfast was fresh & delicious.  Staff very friendly & helpful.  We will definitely return on our next visit to OC.
Manager Response: Judy,   We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback you’ve provided in your review.  Your comments will be shared with our entire team, as this will certainly boost morale.  We hope to continue providing you with the same level of exceptional service for years to come.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: So far, we stayed several time and they assigned good room. We really surprised! Nice room! We want to stay this room again. One bad occur, I ate cut yogurt in breakfast, then it had a mold smell. another cut was no smell.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay and for your kind words about our recently upgraded rooms.  Your comments about the yogurt have been forwarded to management to ensure this was an isolated incident.  We are delighted that you had a good stay at our hotel and we look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.  Sincerely,	 Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent

Summary: Glad I found this hotel. I stayed here three times in 2017 & its now my go to hotel in Southern CA. Everything was perfect from check in, room cleanliness & comfort, parking, breakfast and overall professionalism of the staff. I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are deeply elated that we have been your constant hotel of choice when you're in the area.  As always, don't hesitate to let us know if you're visiting again soon. Our staff is always ready to help you with anything. Thank you and take care.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: This La quinta is undergoing renovations to the rooms and property (I didn't know this when I made the reservation).  The updated rooms are really nice, although parking is a bit challenging with the equipment staging.  Staff is super nice, as usual.  Good value, I will stay again when I'm in OC for business
Manager Response: Terri,   We appreciate the positive rating and informative review!  Your thoughtful comments will assist our management team as well as our future guests.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Overall an enjoyable experience.  I must acknowledge Ms. Victoria who oversaw the front desk.  She was informative and pleasant making my stay a better experience although I did have an unfortunate experience.  The occupant of a room near mine was loud all night long keeping my up and then played music in the wee hours of the A.M..
Manager Response: John,   We sincerely appreciate the lovely compliments you've expressed.  Victoria will be delighted to hear this greatly deserved praise.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Excellent experience from start to finish.  The hotel is currently under a major renovation.  The staff and the management  did an excellent of mitigating any inconvenience caused by the ongoing construction.  Our room was one of the ones already completed.  Great job.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the fantastic review!  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,   Danielle LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Gave it a Very Good Rating minor complaints
Summary: There is construction going on right now, parking was slightly limited and lots of detours to get around the property but we stayed in a newly remodeled room that was super nice except for a few minor concern.   I always stay in La Quintas because I have well behaved pets that travel with me.  I LOVED the new flooring they put in the pet friendly rooms, it was soft, had traction so no slipping and sliding dogs, was pleasing aesthetically and easy to clean spilled water bowl.   The decor is very modern and eye pleasing with lots of nice upgrades.  Really liked all the USB ports throughout the room, the nice lighting, the amount of good counter space both in the bathroom and the room itself to set things on.   It is a very spacious, comfortable room.    The breakfast buffet room
Manager Response: Debbey, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your recent stay and for your kind words about our recent renovation.  We are delighted that you had a good stay at our hotel and found our pet friendly rooms to your liking.  We look forward to having you as a guest again in the future. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care Agent LQ Customer Care

Summary: Parking was a nightmare, my heater almost caused a fire and it was beyond noisy  after 10 am. The rooms were clean so thank you for that. I wouldn't complain so much just felt things didn't get handled
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with such detailed feedback about your stay. We are very sorry to hear that several things throughout your stay did not meet your expectations. Your comments will be reviewed by management to ensure your experience is not repeated. We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.       Sincerely,	 Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: from the moment I made reservations; the staff felt like family. Anything I asked they were available, shuttle, directions (3x), my fault; breakfast, quietude. The TV even offered a dream come true by the rivers water and the moonlit night out to sea, I slept like a baby in the comfort of fluffiness. Upon leaving an object behind the staff quickly located it and shipped it home. Will I stay there again? Oj j yes, and again, and again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are very happy to hear that our staff made you feel at home. This is really one of the things that we try to maintain in our hotel. Hoping to see you again soon.     Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Clean rooms noisy rooms surrounded my  room. There was construction during the day.  There was no adequate parking
Summary: There was no parking due to constructiin equpment and containers using half of the parking for the guests.  Clean and nice rooms but very noisy frim other guests staying with pets and kids. Would not stay again at this location. During the holidays
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay.  We are very sorry that your experience was not up to your expectations due to the renovations.  We truly appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we continue working hard to improve our guest’s experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again after our renovation has been completed and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We enjoyed Breakfast! Did not appreciate wake up call that I didn't ask for . A heads up on construction on lobby would of been kind. The service was good I got towels at 9:45pm. My door knob to room 144 was broken
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review of our hotel.  You have noted some deficiencies during your stay and will make sure that these items are looked after. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you and hope you will give us another opportunity to be of service.   Sincerely,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: My review is a complaint that there were no bathrooms available in your temporary check in room while hotel under construction.  We arrived late at night after a full day at Disneyland, it took more than an hour to get to our car, we were tired and myself and two chi,dren REALLY needed a bathroom  quickly - I actually had an ‘accident” before I got to ou4 room - this has never happened before in m6 lifetime - the clerk tried his best to process check in quickly BUT PLEASE!! provide a room closeby check in for your guests that has a bathroom!! - THANK YOU!
Manager Response: Linda,   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay.  We are very sorry that your experience was not up to your expectations due to the renovations.  We truly appreciate your feedback, and will keep your comments in mind while we continue working hard to improve our guest’s experience. We hope you’ll stay with us again after our renovation has been completed and tell us what you think about our improvements.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: the management does not even consider the requests of the guests. the walls and ceiling are thin. i had people banging on my head from 6am. equipments in the gym out of order. door broken. remodelling in progress. a nightmare. stay away.

Nice hotel, good area. Remodelling and Construction through March 2018. Parking is an issue, long walks through construction workers and forklifts, painters. During construction, ask for a big discount..
Manager Response: Greg,   We sincerely apologize for your recent experience with us   It was not our intent to disturb your stay with our renovation project.  For that, we are sincerely sorry. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.  We hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: For a picky person , it's great
Summary: Nice cozy place rooms are extremely large . everything up to date , some construction going on but just keep in mind it's going to be even nicer. Definitely recommend this place and definitely will return
Manager Response: Jennifer,   We appreciate the fantastic feedback and compliments you've given.  Our goal is to provide our guests with a superb experience.  We are pleased to hear that we accomplished that goal!  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Room good, Fire alarm not so much
Summary: Except of the fire alarm going off at 2:30 am and not stopping until 3:30 am all was good. Breakfast was as expected as was the room. At checkout a proper adjustment was made for the inconvenience of the sleep disruptio, so all is good.
Manager Response: Ronald,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.          Sincerely,                                                                                                  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: An older hotel with the most beautiful outdoor pool.  I feel safe here traveling alone, and always sleep well with the quiet.  The AC/Heating unit is quiet and works well.  They keep up with the maintenance and the staff is wonderful.  If you like shiny, new and sterile - go someplace else!
Manager Response: Karen,   We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta and look forward to your next visit!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: NICE HOTEL - SHOULD BE BEAUTIFUL AFTER RENOVATION!
Summary: Booked two king rooms for a two nite stay due to their "dog friendly" attitude.  Upon arrival, found the entire front of the facility completely under renovation construction.  They had relocated the lobby to a hotel room, but not a big deal.  Check in was very fast by extremely friendly personnel and we were in a newly renovated room over looking the courtyard and pool within minutes.  Both rooms were beautiful, clean and updated.  They are a mini suite type layout, with a small living space separate from the bed area.  Each room had a fridge and microwave, along with all the basic hotel  necessities (iron / toiletries / etc).  It was obvious that both rooms had been recently updated and were in perfect condition.  My only complaint (if you call it that), was that the bathroom
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your clean, recently remodeled room.  However, we are extremely sorry to hear about the disruption caused by the fire alarm being set off by a Halloween prankster.  We do hope you will stay with us again to experience our fully upgraded hotel. Sincerely, Bennie LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Very happy with the OC La Quinta
Summary: At first I was worried because there was a lot of construction going on, but this did not hamper the experience with an excellent room, very quiet at night when we wanted to sleep, and the breakfast was great as well.
Manager Response: Chris,   We sincerely appreciate the time you've taken to shed such a wonderful light on your experience with us.  We hope to continue having you as our guest for many years to come.  As always, we thank you for choosing La Quinta!    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The building itself looked very ugly compared to its neighbor hotels which looked fancier and more elegant... but on the bright side the staff were extremely caring and nice, especially the one making breakfast.
Manager Response: Adriana,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay.  While we thank you for your kind words about our staff, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the hotel in general. Please note that this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.                    Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Nice Hotel, Fridge and Microwave. No restaurant, but there is one in walking distance close Hotel and good safe area. Nice remodeled rooms. Near Orange County airport and freeways. Staff was good. Free breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Joane,  Thanks for your review! We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great location being next close to the freeway but that's about it. Be aware that this hotel is undergoing a major renovation. The room was in very poor condition and was necessary to complain to the front desk. The clerk apologized for the condition but did not offer to reduce the rate or any other solution to satisfy me. I had to find a different hotel the next day of my trip
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We sincerely apologize for your recent negative experience with us   It was not our intent to disturb your stay with our renovation project.  For that, we are sincerely sorry. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.  We hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel is going through a major renovation.  Everything is being replaced.  So if you are not good with construction activity, beware.  We thought the new look and feel of the rooms was terrific - fresh and modern and very comfortable.  We travel with our dogs and the grassy areas were sufficient for us but be aware that there a lot of snails/slugs in and around the grass in some of the grassy areas.  Other than that, the stay was good.
Manager Response: Roberta,   We certainly appreciate the time you've taken to provide your feedback.  It sounds as though your experience was enjoyable overall. Your suggestions for a better stay have been shared with management.   We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Room was nicely remodeled. Staff was helpful. I've stayed at other LaQuintas and have not been disappointed. The only suggestion is maybe more variety at breakfast. It was the same thing three days in a row.
Manager Response: Pam,   We truly regret that our breakfast options did not meet your expectations. Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you.  Your review will be shared with our management staff so that we can rectify these issues. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Everything was just as advertised. They even allowed us to check in early.  What a treat! In spite of the major renovations going on, the place was quiet by evening. The workers left everything neat and tidy so we were not inconvenienced by the work.
Manager Response: Terry,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.          Sincerely,                                                                                                  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Hotel Under Construction has Upgraded Remodeled Rooms
Summary: Great Hotel for staying in the LA area with a real sized Dog! Can even take surface streets all the way to Huntington Dog Beach. Still under construction so expect early AM noise although the room upgrades are quite nice. Everything in the room has been replaced & remodeled with a fresh on trend suite design. Never encountered bed bugs over the years however minor ant infestation in bathroom post remodel. Front desk staff underwhelm in the service & competence skills.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We truly regret that our accommodations did not fully meet your expectations.  Surely this was quite an inconvenience for you. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity in the near future.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel was very nice and the staff was too. Love the pool. The breakfast was good. I had no problems at all. Fell right to sleep in  the nice bed. My wife and kids loved it too. It was verry quite in the room. I will be back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Charlie,  Thank you so much! We are so happy to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy yourselves at our hotel! Thanks again for letting us know, and we look forward to having you back again!      Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I book this hotel because it looks good from the photos.  However it is a one and a half star.  I saw a dropping on the bathroom bench and I was not sure whether it is from a cockroach or a rat.  I pointed it out to the room service lady and she immediately wiped it away, saying there is no cockroach or rat in the room.  And sure it is, when I showered at night, the cockroach crawled out.  I managed to squash it and took a photo of it.  Also I took a photo of the tiny black bed bug moving on the bed sheet once I had a patch of rashes on the back of my thigh.  I mentioned that to the check-out person but she was not interested in looking at the photos.  The air conditioner was dripping water at the front door and we had to be careful when getting in and out of the room to avoid
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We were very disappointed to read of your experience during your stay with us.  While an apology will regrettably not alter the outcome of your experience on this occasion, we do extend it with all sincerity. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests. Each concern will be addressed, in an attempt to correct and improve our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Everything was above my expectations for the price of this hotel. The breakfast was great with a nice selection.  The staff were courteous, friendly and informative.  Our suite room had a nice seating area    But the bathroom fan was loud and went on automatically when the light was turned on!!
Manager Response: Susan,  Thank you for your review. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.          Sincerely,                                                                                                  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed her for my birthday weekend my husband planned. Check in was very easy and hassle free and the attendant was friendly. We had a mini fridge and sink in our room and there was a separate living area away from the bed that made the room very large and spacious. King size bed was very comfortable and the ac was a God send! The water pressure in the shower was amazing although the water did take a while to drain. Quiet and very accessible and even though it is right off the 55, no noise complaints and hubby got a deal during Labor Day weekend. Thumbs up for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad to hear that your stay with us was a memorable one! We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Couple months ago we stayed La Quinta in Santa Barbara. It was nice and clean and we're happy about it so this time we booked it again in Orange County. Was very disappointed when smelled very strong odor as soon as the door opened. Looked around saw wall, floor, bathtub, sink, toilet looked very old and dirty. There was a big stain on floor, around toilet bowl. Bathroom door had a big damaged and it's already fixed but looked very poor. Beds are old and crap. Found a big cockroach on floor next to dog water bowl in the morning. When I walked my dog out, saw another big cockroach in hallway, 2 room next to my door. Looked like someone just threw it out from their room. Very gross! This place definitely need to be upgraded or re-modeling. They should not let guesses stay until
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We apologize for your concerns mentioned and are disappointed that our hotel did not exceed your expectations.  Steps will be taken to correct those problems.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a true La Quinta experience.    Respectfully,  Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: There is no shortage of hotels in this highly convenient location off the 55 in Santa Ana. I have stayed at many of them but keep returning to LaQuinta for its reasonable rates, well appointed rooms, and courteous service. This time around (August, 2017) there was some remodeling in progress, but it really didn't interfere with my stay. Pros: convenient, well maintained, friendly cleaning staff, and reasonable rates. Cons: breakfast is really not worth it (hockey-puck sausage and powdery eggs) and walls are thin which is a problem when inconsiderate guests clop-clop through the exterior halls and settle down for the night. Along Hotel Terrace there are a couple of  better (and pricier) hotels and at least one really bad hotel. So La Quinta gets my business by default. I would
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  While we are happy to hear that overall your visit to La Quinta was positive, it’s a disappointment that even one aspect of your stay failed to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for your honest feedback, and we hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity.  Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel currently under renovation.  Newly remodeled rooms are beautiful and the staff is great! I strongly recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for a great value and accommodations.  Have stayed at this hotel monthly for nearly 2 years and am always pleased to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thanks for brightening our day!  We appreciate the positive feedback and will share your review with our staff.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stay here when we are in town visiting friends about every 3 months.  Just stayed in a newly remodeled king room. Very nice!  I was impressed with the decor. The staff have always been friendly and willing to assist. We stay here because it is close to our friends, but now with the remodel, it is much more pleasant and appealing.
Manager Response: Dear K Edwards, Thanks for taking the time to post a rating of your stay and your kind words about our recent renovation.  We are delighted that you like our new décor.  We look forward to having you as guests again in the future. Sincerely, Bennie, LQ Customer Care

Summary: We were able to check in to one of the newly remodeled rooms.  Hotel management advised that many of the other rooms were currently in the process of being remodeled, and there might be some construction noise; we did not experience any construction noise during our stay.  Our room was very nice, and we would definitely stay at this property again.  The breakfast items were o.k., on par with other hotel continental breakfasts.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks for posting a review of your stay and your kind words about our recently remodeled rooms. We are very happy to hear that you had a good stay and we look forward to having you as a guest again soon.    Sincerely,  Bennie, LQ Customer Care

Summary: The location was great  Easy to walk to food  Easy to get to the concert venue  Not loud  Very clean Check in and check out very quick Newer rooms Loved the barn door bathroom Refrigerator and microwave in the room
Manager Response: Dear Laurie,  We appreciate your positive feedback about our hotel. We do take pride in catering to our guests' needs the best way we can. If you're traveling to our area again soon, don't hesitate to call us.       Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: Here's the short list: Did not clean the room for two days. When we asked why the manager argued that the housekeeper is time to go home and doesn't have time.   Breakfast. My wife and I had the eggs and my wife and I spent the day on the toilet.   Each night (morning) between 4-5am someone knocked on our door. When I didn't answer they knocked again. When I said WRONG ROOM! He ran away.   Finally the attached picture were our sheets. This was at the head of the bed. Clearly the housekeeper (when she did show up finally) could see the stains.   Why does La Quinta allow this GM to stay?
Manager Response: Larry,   We are very disappointed to hear of your recent experience with us.  We offer our sincerest apologies and request that you follow up with our LQ Customer Care Team for better assistance with this matter at LQCustomerCare@LQReviews.com.  We look forward to hearing from you.  Respectfully,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Clean, comfortable, updated rooms with plenty of ways to charge devices. Excellent staff and management.  Free WiFi.  Close to airport, business, and shopping districts.  Easy access to freeways.  Ample fee parking.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Your kind comments are very much appreciated.  At La Quinta Inn & Suites, we constantly strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed. We hope to see you back real soon.                                                                                              Respectfully,                                                                                                                                         Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary: I have stayed at this property several times in the past and the motif was average and elderly but very clean.  Check this property out on your next visit and make sure you stay in one of the newly renovated rooms.  I am here to tell you there is NOTHING that is not new and modern, from floor to ceiling. Lights are bright and the desk light has two eclectic plugs and two USB plugs.  Next to the bed are USB plugs as well.  The bathroom is completely new!!  It was a real pleasure to spend the night at this property on business.   I would be pleased to bring my family to this property for a vacation stay as well.  Check-in was just outstanding!!!
Manager Response: Don,   Your review was such a delight to read!  Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to providing you with the same level of top notch service in the future!    Sincerely,  Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel would have been fine if not for being under construction and the fact that they do not care if you can sleep through the noise even on weekends . No offer of a discount and laundry does not work
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Feedback of your recent stay is appreciated.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a renovation and are very sorry to hear that this had a negative impact on your stay.  We are confident that our many upgrades will benefit all of our guests when completed, and we look forward to having you as a guest again in the future to experience our fully upgraded property. Sincerely, Bennie

Summary: The staff is friendly and helpful.  They respond with a smile to requests and offer their help before you can ask.  The linens are first class and it feels cozy to climb into the pillow top bed with the cozy comforter.  Internet connects automatically with no need for a password. The morning breakfast had something for everyone from cereal to waffles and sausage and eggs.
Manager Response: Dear Jeri,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback on our property. We appreciate your positive remarks regarding your stay. We work very hard to deliver a superior level of service and are glad your stay was comfortable. We look forward to seeing you again real soon!  Sincerely, Diana - LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Great location and great remodel underway.
Summary: We started off in an older room, which was smoky. We complain and or move to a newly remodeled room. This was an excellent upgrade. Once complete, this should be an excellent experience.  The staff was excellent, and the driver to the airport was great.
Manager Response: Charles,  Thank you for your review! We are sorry to hear your first room did not meet your needs but glad you enjoyed the upgraded room once you were moved.  Please look us up again when you're in the area.    Respectfully,  Juan LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel was very outdated.  The bathroom wasn't clean at all.  It had holes in the ceiling.  The A/C unit didn't work well at all.  When staff looked at it they couldn't fix it and suggested we move to another room.  The hotel was sold out so it wouldn't have mattered.  Bathtub wouldn't drain as well.  I had to call someone in to plunge the water out of it.  Also the toilet clogged up.  Part of it could be due to the fact it was a .8 gal per flush toilet.  Must be some liberal CA law about water conservation.  If you have to flush 3 times for every 1 time with the bigger toilets then whats the point???
Manager Response: Dear Kevin,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. The issues you described are truly regrettable. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you and have shared your comments with our management staff to ensure the issues are corrected immediately.  We appreciate you bringing this to our attention and hope you will stay with us again in the future.   Sincerely, Diana

Summary: It is hard to give review of appearance, since they are starting to remodel. It has the feel like a hotel in Mexico. We stayed for 5 days for baseball tournament, so we booked last minute and they were able to accommodate the entire team and families. For the price, I believe it was worth it. The complimentary breakfast was okay, but could have been more options. (Was the same everyday)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review. We are pleased that you had a good stay overall. However, we apologize for the issues with breakfast and any inconvenience that may have been caused. We will use your feedback to improve our processes and hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, Diana

Summary Heading: Tips for a good stay at La Quinta
Summary: Great place for pet-friendly hotel.  However, make sure any and all adults staying have their name on the reservation otherwise they require a PHONE CALL from the absent spouse to acknowledge that the spouse traveling has "permission" to stay at the hotel.  Ridiculous.  Room numbering is off due to construction.  Be sure to ask for specific instructions for your floor, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Feedback of your recent stay is appreciated.  We are delighted that you liked our hotel and appreciated our pet friendly hotel.  Due to past issues, the name on the reservation must match the name of the guest and we apologize if this had a negative impact on your stay.  As you mentioned, we are undergoing a complete renovation and we are trying very hard to finish up as quickly as possible.  We are confident that the many upgrades will benefit all of our guests.  We do hope to have you as a guest again in the future to experience our fully upgraded hotel. Sincerely, Bennie

Summary: Ants in bathroom, ok breakfast, staff not friendly, works like the place is in fire instead of taking time to be thorough and informative!  Dogs all over barking in the dining area not cool. Wouldn't stay therecagain
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We apologize for the issues that you have noted and are disappointed that our hotel did not exceed your expectations.  Steps will be taken to correct those problems.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

Summary Heading: Get Spousal Permission and Bring Your Own Exterminator
Summary: This was my third stay at this hotel in the past five years. The location is terrific for all our comings and goings in the area. Management must have changed, or something, since my last stay. From the second I TRIED to check in, it was a disaster.  My husband made the reservation but didn't end up traveling with us. When I arrived to check in, the employee at the front desk insisted I call my husband to GET PERMISSION to use the reservation. When I indignantly let him know that in all my years of traveling I have NEVER had a hotel even suggest such a thing much less require it, he smirked and then shared an inside joke with another employee, in a foreign language, right in front of me. (Reservations are often in my husband's name, under his accounts and NO ONE has ever batted
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   We are very sorry to hear of your negative experience while staying with us.  We appreciate the constructive critique, as we are continuously striving to improve our guest's experience.  It is only through your feedback that improvements are considered and made.  Our hope is that you will give us a chance to better serve you in the future.  We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   Danielle  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Always remember to book a head of time so they can get you token care of. I love the amenities such as the pool, the breakfast in the morning was also great. I love the fact that the housekeeper is on point if you need anything just call them and they'll come.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you back again.  Sincerely,  Diana

Summary: I have stayed at this property multiple times over the past 10 years and the new facelift is amazing.  The rooms are and have been completely modernized and now it is inexpensive for the amenities that you receive.  Two TV's are a nice complement to the new furniture and workstation.  It is a little shy on closet space however that is addressed by the increased dresser space.  The new renovations are an excellent touch for a great property.  I would put this in the class of the Hyatt Place chain now.  The modern amenities are a very attractive addition  in today's competitive market.  I would like to complement the management staff, specifically Jennifer and Nicole, as the represent what true customer service is in today's hotel business.  They go above and beyond the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are delighted to hear that we have been part of so many journeys that you've taken. We hope that you will stay with us several times more on your next trips. Our staff is always ready to welcome you. Thank you for your loyalty and trust.   Sincerely, Diana

Summary: Great service, breakfast.. free parking, located in a good area, parking lot was overseen by security guy... the only complaint was the jacuzzi.. it was really dirty, the tiles were brown and that made the foam brown as well.. it was gross..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are happy to hear that overall your visit to La Quinta was wonderful.  However, it’s a disappointment that even one aspect of your stay failed to exceed your expectations.  Thank you for your feedback regarding the Jacuzzi. We will share your comments with our management team to ensure the issue is addressed and we hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity.   Respectfully,                Diana

Summary Heading: It was OK you get what you pay
Summary: Fast easy check in. Decent size room and spacious, nice and clean. Tv , Mini fridge, AC and micro worked. Noisy Loud AC. Great patio area & clean pool. Good phone service. Clean bedding and sheets. Wifi worked. Professional friendly staff very helpful. Small bathroom was tolerable though. Housekeeping always seemed to be in a rush always forgot to do something or left something out to replace or clean. Only had 1 good housekeeper during my stay, the rest were poor. Room smelled had to be aired out. Dirty stinky carpeting with stains had to wear flip flops whole time even after showering. Location was good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We understand you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your room and have concerns about our housekeeping standards.  We are very sorry for this experience and want to assure you that the Hotel Management Team will be working with our housekeeping staff to prevent any issues in the future.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.    Sincerely,   Danielle

Summary: Have been a longtime business guest of this property and things have definitely changed for the worst. They are renovating the rooms, which is a definite improvement, but the customer service has gone from great to poor.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thanks so much for submitting a review of your recent stay and alerting us of the customer service not meeting your standards. Although we are delighted that you enjoyed our ongoing renovations and upgraded amenities, this is certainly not the kind of guest experience we want you to have.  We look forward to having you as a guest again in the future. Sincerely, Bennie

Summary: Hotel is in process of upgrading it's hotel rooms.  Stayed in a newly upgraded room.  It is very nice.  Staff at this La Quinta are very helpful and friendly and clearly do their best to help out with any requests.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review! We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.                 Sincerely, Diana

Summary: We booked that hotel by walking in on Saturday by 1:00 am and we paid $105 . The room is super clean and everything was new, it looked like we are the first guests to get this room. They had 2 Ty's and iron. Perfect room for a price you can't beat. Don't confuse it with Costa Mesa one because they are close to each other but a difference in the cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear Hany,  Thank you for choosing La Quinta Inns and Suites. We appreciate you sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community as it helps other travelers decide which hotels the right one for them. We look forward to welcoming you back and until then, we wish you safe travels.  Sincerely, Diana

Summary: Extremely poorly run location. Rooms need updating as carpet has stains and walls are paper thin. Staff is less than helpful other than apologizing, but the  problems aren't fixed. No hot water at times in the morning hours.
Manager Response: Ryan,   Thanks for taking the time to write your review, as we appreciate the feedback.  While our hotel is an older facility, it is still our responsibility and pleasure to present the most clean and comfortable rooms possible.  Your comments indicate that we still have further work to do.  Rest assured we will do everything we can to make the necessary improvements. We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,   Danielle

Summary Heading: Needs to be power washed or something
Summary: I find La Quinta to be a good value hotel in general. This one was under construction and it felt dirty...because it is dirty.  Changed rooms to dirty carpet. Bed felt "old" too. Hopefully they fix this up soon.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We understand you were unhappy with the cleanliness of your room and have concerns about our housekeeping standards.  We are very sorry for this experience and want to assure you that the Hotel Management Team will be working with our housekeeping staff to prevent any issues in the future.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.    Sincerely,   Danielle

Summary Heading: Good, comfortable, good area and price-
Summary: Nice Staff, good room with fridge, microwave, couch. good for animals..watch the CATS, put something like Towels behind he bed, they hide in the back space, bed will move out.. Maids will stay out if you put a note also and don't enter.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your review. We truly appreciate your business and hope you will choose us for your future lodging needs. Sincerely, Diana

Summary Heading: Mostly good, but a few issues
Summary: We select La Quinta because we travel with our dog and they are very accommodating with pets.  Thank you. The breakfast here was also nice and very well maintained with friendly service. The room was big and we felt welcome. We did encounter problems in our room.  This is a non-smoking hotel and our room had a very strong smell of cigarette smoke! The refrigerator had leaked water all over the carpet, and the handle was broken, which we reported, and were assured it would be taken care of.  No one ever came to check that we know of.  We were there two days, and housekeeping was minimal.  Did not empty trash cans, replenish bath items, or clean bathroom floor. They are in the process of a refurbishment so maybe next time we will ask for an updated room.
Manager Response: Dear DeeAnn, Thanks so much for submitting your review.  We are delighted to hear that you appreciate our pet friendly policy, and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and friendly staff.  However, we are extremely disappointed to hear about the odor in your room and the issue with the fridge.  Further, the fact that your room wasn’t serviced during your 2 day stay is very disheartening.  It is through our guests comments that we learn about these types of issues and we thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Management has been notified of these issues to ensure they are addressed immediately.  As you mentioned, we are trying to finish up our renovation as quickly as possible and we are confident that all of our guests will benefit from the many upgrades.  We look forward to having you as a guest in the future. Sincerely, Bennie

Summary Heading: Another  return to a familiar property.
Summary: I found it consistent with previous stays. It is just a few miles from the venues served. The staff is welcoming, efficient, pleasant, and helpful. I was able to park very conveniently to my car. The breakfast afforded many choices. I expect to return again and would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing La Quinta Inns and Suites, we recognize that there are a lot of hotel choices to choose from and we are proud to be one of your favorites. We appreciate you sharing your experience with the TripAdvisor community as it helps other travelers decide which hotels the right one for them. We look forward to welcoming you back and until then, we wish you safe travels. Sincerely,                                                                                                               Robert

Summary: It's an older property but is being remodeled. I had an absolutely great room. Staff top notch. I so did not want to get out of that bed, comfortable‼️ Pool was perfect temp. Only negative was that the top tiles need a good cleaning but water was clean and refreshing.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your comments and we wish to welcome you back to the hotel soon!

Summary: I really like staying at all La Quinta Hotels, I always have a positive experience. The rooms are always clean as well as the bathrooms. Staff is always friendly and breakfast is always a plus with different options to choose from. My always stay hotel for all my traveling and I really take advantage of the rewards program.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Your feedback is important and we are so glad to hear that you are a loyal guest.  We truly appreciate your kind words about our hotel and look forward to having you as a guest in the future. Sincerely, B Ames, LQ Customer Care

Summary: This hotel was recently upgraded, it was beautiful, the rooms were very nice and it was the most comfortable bed and pillows 💜😊the free breakfast was the best I have ever had!!! Great staff!!! Great location, beautiful pool area, would definitely book a room here 😊
Manager Response: Hi Lisa; Wow! What a wonderful review, we truly appreciate your business and your trust in us. We are very happy to hear that our staff and service met your needs and expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.      Sincerely,                                                                                                               LQ Customer Care

Summary: Nice, clean rooms. Great breakfast in the morning. I love how this hotel is pet friendly. Staff is awesome and best price around. I would highly recommend this place if you want a comfortable place to stay. Location is in a nice area and lots of things to do nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your compliments of our hotel, staff, and breakfast! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Santa Ana La Quinta Inn
Summary: Have stayed multiple times @ LQ Santa Ana...staff is outstanding, and rooms are spacious and clean. Breakfast is standard, fresh, and good quality. Location is close to everything: beach, Disneyland, Arena, free- way to other cities.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher, Thank you for submitting a review of your recent stay at our hotel.  It sounds like you had another great guest experience, and enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms.  We truly appreciate your kind words, and thank you for always choosing our hotel when visiting this area.  We look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.   Sincerely, B Ames

Summary: Excellent staff, good rooms, good breakfast, good value.  Pet friendly.  Easy access to/from freeway/airport.  Have stayed at many hotels in Orange County and this is currently my favorite.   Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words.  We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary Heading: La Quinta towed away my car without even checking
Summary: There were a bunch of angry customers who's cars were towed away from the hotels parking lot. we couldn't find the manager who was on the vacation, the receptionist didn't know what to do and offered to wait. Never will stop here again.

Summary Heading: We're not I Kansas any more.
Summary: Stayed 3 nights. I live in the country so keep in mind that a trip to L.A. is a big adjustment for me. The rooms are being remodeled during the visit, so I am not sure if my room was a before or after. The rooms are clean and quiet, however the rooms facing the courtyard will get a lot of noise from people coming and going. Also the pool and spa user noise is quite noticeable. If you age a light sleeper this may be a reason to get a room on the outside vs facing the courtyard.  The staff was very good and really seemed to enjoy there work. There is some air traffic overhead on a fairly regular basis but it not overly loud and not noticed by most people used to the city life. The location was great for me, fast access to the freeway and restaurants. The internet service was fast
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying at La Quinta Inns and Suites.  We am very happy that the location was great. We apologize for the renovations you encountered.  We apologize for any inconvenience. Hopefully you'll visit us again when all our new offerings are ready.  We can't wait to show them off!                                                                                                                     Sincerely, LQ Customer Care

Summary: We stayed here to go to SoCal Corgi Day and I have to say that we were pleasantly surprised at how nice and clean the rooms were and the staff  was efficient and friendly and there was a decent breakfast. I watched the person handling the breakfast area take such wonderful care of a person who might have been blind or had difficulty seeing.  She took such great care of him and I was so impressed.  Left me with a good feeling!!  Nicole the manager was so nice too.
Manager Response: Our staff constantly strives to go above and beyond to ensure that your stay is the best it can be, so we are truly humbled by your review. It was our pleasure to of service as we truly care about assisting our guests in any way. We are happy that we had the opportunity to serve you and we hope you will choose La Quinta Inns and Suites in your future travels.  Sincerely, LQ Customer Care

Summary: Glad to see the breakfast has improved with the addition of eggs and sausage. How about adding some gravy. Also the manager of this property is excellent and very attentive to make your stay is always as best as possible.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to submit a review of your stay, and for your kind words about our manager at this property.  It sounds like you had a great guest experience.  We look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: May be the best value in Santa Ana
Summary: This is a reasonably priced hotel where the rooms are clean and larger than most, with a nice pick-me-up breakfast, and an exceptional staff.  I booked through AAA and it was one of the best priced hotels in the area.  The location has convenient access to the highway.  The staff is super helpful and willing to go the extra mile.  This is my go-to place when I stay in this area.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for taking the time to submit a review of your recent stay.  It always delights us to hear kind words about our helpful staff.  We are glad that you liked our location and felt our hotel is a good value.  It sounds like you had a great stay at our hotel and we look forward to having you as a guest again in the future.  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The hotel's location is very convenient, the room is big and comfortable, I likes the bed the most. Just the staff I encountered is not that experienced and results in inefficient service experiences.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback on our property. We appreciate your positive remarks regarding our rooms and convenient location.  However, we are extremely sorry if our staff did not meet your expectations. Your comments have been shared with management.  We look forward to having you as a guest again soon.

Summary: We needed a  place to rest  after a  birthday party  in the area. The  staff were friendly and helpful during our visit.The rooms  need  remodeling  which  they are  in the  process of doing but they  failed to  inform me of  this when I reserved  the  room. The  room was clean and  has a  microwave and  small  refrigerator. The  swimming pool and jacuzzi were clean.
Manager Response: Thanks for feedback of your recent stay.  We are glad to hear that you had a good stay at our hotel. We look forward to having you as a guest in the future.  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Very poorly run property too bad as the area has some nice competition. Room service was not responsive, room was left 3 out of 4 days not cleaned. The 3rd floor was under construction thus not available for use. My car was damaged in parking lot as I saw the contractor trying to get his trailer with materials so he could unload it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We strive to offer a comfortable stay for our guests and it seems we fell short during your stay. Please accept our sincere apologies. We always try our very best to accommodate all of our guests preferences and we are very sorry that we were unable to do so on your visit.

Summary: Found parking somewhat difficult when I arrived.  The Embassy Suites next door charges a minimum of $16 per night for parking, and I suspect a goodly number of their guests park here.  My first room was blazing hot; the a/c unit was running full hot, and the TV didn't work.  Reporting this to the front desk resulted in apologies and a no-hassle move to another room, which was lovely.  Really enjoyed breakfast:  unlike many La Quinta properties, this one had scrambled eggs and an outdoor seating area.  Love fresh air!
Manager Response: Positive feedback of your recent stay is appreciated.  We are delighted to hear that our staff was able to move you to a comfortable room and you had a great guest experience.  We look forward to having you as a guest in the near future.

Summary: using their stay and fly option we always stay here and leave our car rather than park at the airport.  Hotel has a heated pool and great hot tub.  several restaurants close by .  has free shuttle service to the air port .  very close to airport only 5 minutes
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope your next stay is just around the corner! We are so glad to hear that we were able to offer our services for your traveling needs. Looking forward to welcoming you back soon.  Respectfully,  LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Dated but remodeling. Was a nice experience never the less
Summary: People were real friendly. Bigger than most rooms in hotels. Breakfast was hot and good. Room had refrigerator and large screen tv. Set up like a suite with a couch and chair. Bathroom was nicely done but did need a caulk rehab. Hotel should be fantastic once they refurnish the rooms. Beautiful landscaping.
Manager Response: It’s great to know that your stay with us at La Quinta Inn & Suites was as enjoyable as we hoped it would be. We will be sure to share your fantastic comments with our housekeeping and maintenance teams, who take special pride in serving our guests. We’re looking forward to having you again as our guests!  Respectfully,  LQ Customer Care

Summary: Desk personnel was less than helpful when I asked to extend my stay.  I felt that they could have called corporate themselves rather than handing me a phone number to take care of it myself.  It is unfortunate that this location has chose to close so many rooms at one time.  I will be working in this area again and would prefer this La Quinta rather than the one 4.5 miles away.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed the location of our hotel.  As you noted, we are currently running several projects in the hotel as we work through upgrading and refurbishing our hotel. We are confident that the improvements will benefit our guests. We are extremely disappointed that the front desk was less than accommodating, and your comments have been shared with management.  Thanks again and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Needs work; toilet leaked, room was very poorly lit, bed was a swayback with a poor selection of covers and the room had no sound insulation.  No bathroom in the lobby and you need a card Key to get in the nearest one.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. Your opinion and satisfaction is very important to us and we are very sorry we were unable to meet your expectations. We continually try to do our very best for all of our guests. We will share your review with the hotel's management team to address and resolve the issues you noted.     Respectfully,  LQ Customer Care

Summary: The room is ok but the bathroom is beyond standard .It is pathetic. They did remodel the room and area in the front but the bathroom never been touch. Cracked sinks, look really dirty, the toilet is really gross looking. I did not even want to use the shower either.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to express your concerns regarding the experience that you encountered.  Our guest expectation is very important to us and when we fall short we take it very serious and strive to correct the issues. Please accept a sincere apology from our team for the inconvenience caused to you. We would love to make things right and hope that you will give us another opportunity in the future to provide you with the service both you and we expect. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Love the La Quinta Hotels - *Pet friendly*
Summary: I love that the La Quinta Hotels are pet friendly so I don't have to worry about getting a pet hotel or someone to watch them while away.  I'd rather just take them with me.    The staff is friendly and great service  Great variety for breakfast in the morning and decent hours you can actually make on time.   Great location  Overall had a great stay and my pets enjoyed it too! :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your business and welcome you and your four-legged family members at La Quinta!

Summary: Air conditioner wouldn't work, reported it and they sent a worker to "look" at it, after 30 minutes he says "I'm not a ac tech but you can use the window with no screen" ummm no! Not with my kids there!
Manager Response: Thank you for your direct and genuine feedback. Rest assured we will be looking into the comments you have made about your experience.  We hope to continue to have you as our guest, and look forward to another chance to serve you.   Sincerely,   LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: LA QUINTA IS THE BEST HOTEL of Orange County of SANTA ANA CA
Summary: La Quinta of Orange County - Santa Ana  is the best hotel i ever stayed at. i love this hotel i wouldnt change La Quinta hotel to go to a different hotel. All the rooms are super clean. The guy that checked me in was really nice he new what he was doing we didnt take long to check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for the top notch review!  We appreciate you taking the time to convey your feedback.  Please come visit us again soon!    Sincerely,   LQ Customer Care

Summary: great location for where I had to go. Close to John Wayne airport with parking included for my rental. Nothing really to eat close by but the rooms were clean and the reception was warm. wifi worked well
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are pleased to hear that you were happy with the location. We constantly strive to provide excellent service and satisfaction to all of our guests, and when a guest takes the time to write, we are especially grateful.  Thank you for your business and hope you continue to choose us for your lodging needs.  Sincerely, LQ Customer Care

Summary: We usually stay exclusively at La Quinta Inns across the country for their pet friendly policies. That being said This specific La Quinta falls well short of the quality we normally experience.        After a very long road trip, it was indicated that we were lucky that there was, "only one room left" which was surprising since we had booked our room online 2 weeks in advance so should have had one prepared and not just be lucky that there was one available. However, upon getting to the room we were disappointed at the lay out since the TV is difficult to see from the bed in the "open" layout.  The closet positioning in the room made little since seeing that it basically cut the room in half. The bed being flanked by two mirrors and the closet doors being mirrored facing the bed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Please know that your feedback is extremely important for us to continue to improve our service. We strive to offer a smooth and comfortable stay for our guests and it seems we fell short during your stay. Please accept our sincere apology. We encourage you to please reach out to us in regards to your stay.   Respectfully, LQ Customer Care

Summary Heading: Not as good as it us to be
Summary: Hotel clean and great location, but breakfast was very, very poor.  went out for breakfast after second day.Staff was very nice and helpful and we love the location. We had many questions and every one at the front desk was more than helpful and very nice to talk with. Maybe the heavy rains and flooding they had the week before we came had something to do with the very poor breakfast, it was in a different area than before (the patio area it had always been in had been flooded  so in was in what looked like a storage room}. Have always liked this hotel, get the breakfast together and we might give you another try.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving a review of your stay with us. I am glad that our location and service was to your satisfaction. We are definitely disappointed to hear that you were unhappy with the breakfast served at our property.  However, your response will go a long way toward improving breakfast for your next and future guests' stays.  We offer you our sincerest apologies and are hopeful that you allow us another opportunity to welcome you as a guest upon your next visit to the area.  Respectfully,  LQ Customer Care

Summary: I'm not a big fan of out door access to the rooms for security reasons but it doesn't seem to be located in a bad spot. The door handle to my room is literally fixing to fall off and you have to hit the key a few times and get the handle in the right spot to open the door. In my opinion I think it's priced a little high for what it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in the areas mentioned.  Please note this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciate your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   LQ Customer Care

Summary: La Quinta is a bit dated and it shows on the wall and hallway. The room's carpet has stains too. Overall, the price was reasonable, the location was great (right off hwy 55), the room was clean but had a musty smell throughout my 4-night stay. Hot breakfast was ok if you need a little something before heading out. Only cut fresh fruit available. I wish they had some whole bananas or apples. There is a small swimming pool and hot tub but no one was using it because of the weather I guess. Staff was pleasant and helpful. Both elevators worked well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. We are very sorry to hear that the hotel was not up to par in regards to updates. Please note that this information has been passed on to our management staff to ensure improvements are considered and made. We very much appreciated your business and thank you for staying with us.    Sincerely,   LQ Customer Care

Summary: My stay at this hotel was nice and comfortable, staff was warm and welcoming. Check in and Check out process was easy which I was SO thankful for, literally hassle free. Breakfast was AWESOME, saved us money on all three days that we were there. Thank you La Quinta!
Manager Response: Dear Alyssa, Thanks for submitting a review of your recent stay at our Orange County – Santa Ana property.  We are delighted to hear that our staff was accommodating during your stay, and provided a hassle free check-in and check-out.  We are extremely glad you found our hotel to be a good value, and look forward to having you as a guest again in the future. Thanks again!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel.. great location, great pet policy
Summary: Good mid-price hotel. Great location. LaQuinta's  friendly " no additional charge" pet policy is what brings us to this great hotel chain. Complementary breakfast   with above average choices. Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your review.  We appreciate your compliments regarding our great breakfast and location.  We take pride in offering our guests and their pets top notch service!    Sincerely,   LQ Customer Care

Summary: Hotel was clean and warm.  Breakfast was very good with hot foods like eggs and sausage. Unfortunately the spa was not in service during our stay. The TV would only produce 25% of maximum sound so I had to use close captioning in order to get all of the dialogue.  There is nothing wrong with my hearing. Staff was friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. I apologize for TV volume issue you experienced during your stay. I will make it a point to go into the room and get this fixed as soon as possible. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The room was big and roomy good value. We did not partake in the breakfast so I could not say how good or bad it was. Staff was friendly and helpful.  Good location to get around Orange County.  Only drawback was the Disney park visit as it was not a happy place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful remarks, which we will share with our staff.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and look forward to welcoming you back soon.                                                                                                                                  Sincerely,                                                                                                                                               LQ Customer Care

Summary: The toilet plumbing was weak and the toilet was clogged on Xmas morning. The water was spilled on the floor and I had to suck the water on the floor with a tower. I could not afford to wait for the hotel assistance because we needed to rush out for an appointment. The hotel is old and definitely needs upgrades
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with such detailed feedback about your stay. We are very sorry to hear that several things throughout your stay did not meet your expectations. Please note that your concerns regarding the plumbing issues have been passed on to our Maintenance and Management Teams. We do hope you give us another chance as we will definitely improve our services.                                                                                                                                                     Respectfully,                                                                                                          LQ Customer Care

Summary: Average in this case means "good", since there is no "good" rating.  We stayed here in adjoining rooms with our adult daughter over Christmas and had good service from the staff while we watched the Christmas parade and so forth.  The hotel seemed quite full but we didn't notice too much noise.      We would recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: When a guest takes the time to write, we are especially grateful. Thank you for your kind words.   We are pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay. At LaQuinta Inn & Suites, we constantly strive to provide. Thank you for your wonderful feedback regarding your stay at LaQuinta Inn & Suites.  We strive daily to ensure that all of our guests are well taken care of, and we never tire of hearing when we succeed. We hope to see you back real soon.  Sincerely, LQ Customer Care

Summary: Great place to stay overnight on trip to Orange County. Clean room, bead, and bathroom. Easy check in with helpful clerk who new the Santa Ana Coasta Mesa and Newport area. Good breakfast and breakfast area. Great location near South Coast Plaza. Will go back again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay!  We are extremely happy to hear that you had a smooth and quick check-in.  Our location is something that we take great pride in, and it delights us that you appreciated the cleanliness of your room during your stay.  Our housekeeping staff does a great job of keeping our hotel clean to ensure that every guest has a great guest experience. We look forward to having you as a guest in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great Value, Large room, Comfortable Bed, Pool & Spa, but Paper Thin Walls
Summary: Overall, a very nice hotel for the money.  Very well kept and clean.  My room faced the pool (quite nice) but behind my room was another that faced the parking lot.  I'm pretty sure the wall between us was built prior to the invention insulation or sound-proofing.  I could hear kids playing, screaming, crying, and later on, adults talking until 11:00 PM.  This didn't bother me too much because I don't go to bed before then anyway, but this could upset someone else.  This is the only reason I didn't rate this hotel higher.  I just had the complimentary breakfast.  The scrambled eggs and sausages were hot.  They also had fresh Cantaloupe and Musk Melon, cereal, waffles, bagels, toast, coffee, apple and orange juice.    Really Loved: Thermostatically controlled heat and air  Likes:
Manager Response: Dear Dave, Feedback of your recent stay at our Orange County-Santa Ana property is very important to us.  Rarely do we see a review where every amenity is mentioned and we are truly delighted to hear that we exceeded your expectations and you found our hotel to be a great value. It was disappointing, however, to hear that noise from the neighboring room was a distraction due to sparse insulation and sound-proofing.  This property is schedule for a renovation and your comments will be shared with hotel management.  We look forward to your next stay, so that you can experience this property again. Thanks again!

Summary: The staff in this hotel was exceptional.  Every request we had was immediately addressed with a can do attitude.  The manager looked to help us plan our staff in the most economical way.  One of the primary reasons to stay at this hotel is the quality of the staff and their friendliness and willingness to help.
